channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-17617] Incorrect representation of RESPONSE for Get Key Version in KMS index.md.vm file
item.description:
Format of RESPONSE of Get Key Versions in KMS index.md.vm is incorrect

https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r3.1.1/hadoop-kms/index.html#Get_Key_Versions

Attached the outputs of the commands for reference
item.summary: Incorrect representation of RESPONSE for Get Key Version in KMS index.md.vm file

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Sushma_28 can you keep the command output in this jira..?
brahmareddy , I have attached the command output for reference, Can you please review.

Sushma_28 thanks for uploading which will be clear for this issue.

One minor nit: Sorry I missed before.

can you change like following..?

"versionName" : "version"  To   "versionName" : "<version>",
Thank you for the review brahmareddy, I have uploaded  HADOOP-17617.003.patch as per the review comment. Please Review.
